question: لِيَبْتَلِيَكُمْ
answer: so that He may test you

question: لِتَحْسَبُوهُ
answer: so that you may think it

question: وَلِأُحِلَّ
answer: and so that I make lawful

question: وَلَأُدْخِلَنَّهُمْ
answer: and surely I will admit them

question: بِقِنْطَارٍ
answer: with a great amount of wealth

question: الْقَيُّومُ
answer: the Sustainer of all that exists

question: وَوُفِّيَتْ
answer: And will be paid in full

question: فَيُوَفِّيهِمْ
answer: then He will grant them in full

question: تُوَفَّوْنَ
answer: you will be paid in full

question: الْمُتَوَكِّلِينَ
answer: the ones who put trust (in Him)
